sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"灵魂，心灵"之意。
means: soul ： 指超越身体之外，永远存在的无形的东西，即所谓灵魂，亦可作人解。
ghost ： 普通用词，主要指死者的灵魂。
spirit ： 当指与body相对而言的所谓灵魂时，可与soul互换使用，但强调人的精神素质，也指神仙、精灵等。

word_mean: 魂，随心神活动所做出的思维意识活动。当失去精神统领时，会表现为梦幻及梦游现象。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...灵性(spirit), 这些复合体合起来形成所谓的灵魂(soul), 该实体来自太一造物者的精华变得有足够的个体性, 能够去追寻一条看似相当.
7～14岁强调心灵（soul）(Soul)、情感(Feeling)与创造性的想像空间。这个阶段的孩子需要一个足以产生长久信赖和敬仰的权威，藉由艺术化 …
美国的灵魂乐(Soul)并没有因“嬉皮运动”和迷幻摇滚的繁盛而停滞不前。60年代诸多黑人歌星又将其发展并呈现出多种风格的灵魂乐,其 …
2、魂(soul)-是对“己或自我”的知觉(Self-consciousness)。魂是指思想(mind)或情感(feeling)的层面，发挥理性(intelect)或感性(emotion).

list.abs: 暗之魂(dark soul) 技能说明：发射暗属性球，对敌人造成多段暗属性魔法伤害，爆炸会造成更大的暗属性魔法伤害。
在两人努力之下，终于吸出了布鲁士身上的黑暗灵魂(Dark Soul)，洛克人也马上攻击打掉了黑暗灵魂。然后到司令室相讨，再回到家 …

鬼泣（Soul Bringer） 如果把缠绕在臂上的铁链松开,鬼神便会自由的行动,所以一部分鬼剑士会扔掉铁链成为鬼泣圣职者吉格将刀魂卡 …

phrase.cizu_name: the life and soul of the party

jx.jx_cn_mean: 堕入地狱的亡魂；无救的人

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sāwol, sāw(e)l, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch ziel and German Seele

encyclopedia.content: soul 灵魂是生命现象，它依生命大分子、细胞、组织、器官以及生物体本身新陈代谢存在而存在。故这里的灵魂已不是传统意义上的既能附着人体又能在人死后脱离人体的鬼魂了，灵魂医学soul medicine中基础定律——生物体灵魂三定律(即灵魂出现定律、灵魂层次定律以及灵魂效应定律）可有完美科学的诠释。 soul锛堉谥竞痛镲級 无锡众志和达存储技术有限公司（简称众志和达，英文SOUL），是中国信息存储与数据安全领域领先的技术与服务提

entry.def: Your soul is the part of you that consists of your mind, character, thoughts, and feelings. Many people believe that your soul continues existing after your body is dead.

example.ex: She went to pray for the soul of her late husband...
example.tran: 她去为亡夫的灵魂祈祷。

example.ex: 'I will put my heart and soul into the job,' he promises.
example.tran: “我会全身心投入到工作中去，”他保证说。

entry.tran: (民族或政治运动的)精神，精髓
entry.def: The soul of a nation or a political movement is its basic nature and beliefs.

example.ex: ...a struggle for the soul of the Republican Party.
example.tran: 为实现共和党的基本宗旨而进行的奋斗

entry.def: You can refer to someone as a particular kind of soul when you are describing their character or condition.

example.ex: Her mother, poor soul, came to an even worse end.
example.tran: 她的母亲，那个可怜的人，结局更糟糕。

entry.tran: (用于否定句中)一个人(也没有)
entry.def: You use soul in negative statements like not a soul to mean nobody at all.

example.ex: I've never harmed a soul in my life...
example.tran: 我这一生从未伤害过任何人。

example.ex: There was not a soul there.

entry.tran: 灵乐(一种主要由美国黑人音乐家表演的流行音乐，源出福音唱诗及布鲁斯乐曲)
entry.def: Soul or soul music is a type of pop music performed mainly by black American musicians. It developed from gospel and blues music and often expresses deep emotions.

example.tran: 美国灵乐歌手安妮塔·贝克

entry.def: You can refer to the number of people who live in a particular place as souls .

example.tran: 一个只有 100 位居民的小村庄

entry.tran: 出卖灵魂;做违背良心的事
entry.def: If you say that someone sells their soul, you mean that they do something immoral or bad in order to get something they want such as success or money.

example.ex: ...politicians who would sell their soul for the sake of office.
example.tran: 为了谋求官位而不择手段的政客

means.word_mean: 1. the immaterial part of a person; the actuating cause of an individual life

sentences.sentence: "there was too much for one person to do"

means.word_mean: 5. a secular form of gospel that was a major Black musical genre in the 1960s and 1970s;

sentences.sentence: "soul was politically significant during the Civil Rights movement"

auth_sentence.content: It's like old-school soul only with up-to-date instruments.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's like old-school soul only with up-to-date instruments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's like old-school soul only with up-to-date instruments.

auth_sentence.content: He looks like he is looking into your soul.
auth_sentence.res_content: He looks like he is looking into your soul.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He looks like he is looking into your soul.

auth_sentence.content: This is soul music in a very real sense.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is soul music in a very real sense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is soul music in a very real sense.

Sentence.sentence: The Phoenix, in Mid-Levels, offers the widest interpretation of "British cuisine", while still trying to maintain its soul.
So, instead, the damage is done to the children themselves: not to their bodies but to their souls.

The urgency of slowing down-to find the time and space to think-is nothing new, of course, and wiser souls have always reminded us that the more attention we pay to the moment, the less time and energy we have to place it in some larger context.

sentences.en: Teachers are engineers of human soul.
sentences.cn: 教师是人类灵魂的工程师。

means.word_mean: 高尚情操; 真挚情感; 气魄

sentences.en: She has a soul above material pleasures.
sentences.cn: 她有一种不追求物质享受的精神。
那艘载着二百人的船沉没了。

means.word_mean: 精髓, 精华; 中心人物

sentences.en: Brevity is the soul of English.
Your secret's safe with him, and he's the soul of discretion.
sentences.cn: 他会严守你的秘密, 他是谨慎的化身。

jushi.english: Her body died but her soul went to heaven.
jushi.chinese: 她的肉体虽已死亡,但她的灵魂却升入天堂。

jushi.english: He was the life and soul of the enterprise.
jushi.chinese: 他是该企业的核心人物。
